-v|--verbose: --- Use verbose output (-vv very verbose/build.rs output)
--frozen: --- Require Cargo.lock and cache are up to date
--locked: --- Require Cargo.lock is up to date
-Z: --- Unstable (nightly-only) flags to Cargo, see 'cargo -Z help' for details

build|b.--workspace: --- Build all packages in the workspace
build|b.-j|--jobs: --- Number of parallel jobs, defaults to # of CPUs
build|b.--test: --- Build only the specified test target
build|b.--bench: --- Build only the specified bench target
build|b.--release: --- Build artifacts in release mode, with optimizations
build|b.--profile: --- Build artifacts with the specified profile
build|b.--features: --- Space or comma separated list of features to activate
build|b.--out-dir: --- Copy final artifacts to this directory (unstable)
build|b.--build-plan: --- Output the build plan in JSON (unstable)
build|b.--future-incompat-report: --- Outputs a future incompatibility report at the end of the build (unstable)
build|b.-v|--verbose: --- Use verbose output (-vv very verbose/build.rs output)
build|b.--frozen: --- Require Cargo.lock and cache are up to date
build|b.--locked: --- Require Cargo.lock is up to date
build|b.-Z: --- Unstable (nightly-only) flags to Cargo, see 'cargo -Z help' for details

check|c.--workspace: --- Check all packages in the workspace
check|c.-j|--jobs: --- Number of parallel jobs, defaults to # of CPUs

check|c.--bench: --- Check only the specified bench target
check|c.--release: --- Check artifacts in release mode, with optimizations
check|c.--profile: --- Check artifacts with the specified profile
check|c.--features: --- Space or comma separated list of features to activate
check|c.--future-incompat-report: --- Outputs a future incompatibility report at the end of the build (unstable)
check|c.-v|--verbose: --- Use verbose output (-vv very verbose/build.rs output)

check|c.-Z: --- Unstable (nightly-only) flags to Cargo, see 'cargo -Z help' for details
check|c.#desc: Analyze the current package and report errors, but don't build object files

clean.--target: --- Target triple to clean output for

clean.--doc: --- Whether or not to clean just the documentation directory

clean.-Z: --- Unstable (nightly-only) flags to Cargo, see 'cargo -Z help' for details

doc|d.--open: --- Opens the docs in a browser after the operation
